channel.title: Drops
channel.description:
I ve searched all of forums and i couldnt find this thread exactly. So i want to make witch's experiment (4 form) drop Dragon claws ( 1:100) and dragon defender (1:1000) and tokkul (1:150) to drop 50 of them. otherwise i want that they dont drop no charms or bones. How can i make that? i searched npcdrops , npcdrops.class, npcdrops.java , npcdrops.tsm and i cant find npc id 900 ( thats witch experiment). so i made new in npcdrops.txt like this: 900 14484
but i dont know how to make percentage or 100% drop or anything. this would make a big difference on my server. whoever helps when i get some rep++ i will give you rep++!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
:( :( :( :( :( :( :( :(

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

demps2k9:

You would go into rare drops and give it a percentage. But normally if you have quite a few items, it will give it a random percentage on its own.

where are rare drops?

Read full topic

@demps2k9 wrote:

You would go into rare drops and give it a percentage. But normally if you have quite a few items, it will give it a random percentage on its own.

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Blazcobain Blazcobain
item.description:
@Blazcobain wrote:

mrdrzj:

14484:100

if i want to be 100% drop i just type 14484 or 14484:1

And can anyone answer this?
I want that crawling hand would drop 500 coins (id 995) and percentage would be 1 drop to 40 kills?
How do i type it?

Read full topic
